mapper.insert: insert into time_schedule(bno, tname, startTime, endTime, breakStartTime, breakEndTime) values (#{bno}, #{tname}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{breakStartTime}, #{breakEndTime})
mapper.update: update time_schedule set tname = #{tname}, startTime = #{startTime}, endTime = #{endTime}, breakStartTime = #{breakStartTime}, breakEndTime = #{breakEndTime}
mapper.select: select * from time_schedule t, schedule_management s where t.tno = s.tno and s.mno = #{mno} and s.sDay = date(now())
